text: 'THERAPY - TECHNIQUES THAT ARE USED TO HELP PEOPLE WITH MENTAL HEALTH DISORDERS OR PERSONAL PROBLEMS PSYCHOTHERAPY - USE OF PSYCHOLOGICAL PRINCIPLES AND TECHNIQUES TO TREAT MENTAL HEALTH DISORDERS ~+* All psychotherapies are based on the central assumption that underlying psychologica fators such as emtions, cogaitions, behavior, or relationships are at the raot of nterpersonal problems and mentalliness BIOMEDICAL THERAPY - THE USE OF MEDICATIONS OR OTHER BIOLOGICAL INTERVENTIONS TO TREAT MENTAL HEALTH DISORDERS.
